forecast.name: Today

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 8pm and 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. South southeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
